sections.heading: Overview
content:
E. Chester Ridgway, MD, is director of the division of endocrinology,
metabolism, and diabetes and senior associate dean for academic affairs at the
University of Colorado Health Sciences Center. Co-author of Your Thyroid: A
Home Reference , Ridgway has established himself nationally as one of the
most prominent doctors and researchers in the field of endocrinology with
specialization in thyroid disorder research.

Ridgway was appointed president of the American Thyroid Association in 1995,
and has served as a member of the council for both the American Thyroid
Association and the Endocrine Society. Ridgway received his medical degree
magna cum laude from the University of Colorado Medical School and his
undergraduate degree from Dartmouth College.
